column3: Latest;According to the Ministry of Environment on May 16
column5: the following wildlife images were taken on camera traps in Virachey National Park.------Virachey National Park rangers have collected images from a group of 12 automatic cameras to record wildlife presence in Virachey National Park.------ Park rangers set up the cameras from April 2019 to the end of April 2020
column6: with locations at the foot of Mount Heang along Cambodia-Lao border
column7: and others around O-Khampa.------Images of these wildlife presence are important information for rangers to pay special attention to in terms of protection and conservation. ------AREY
